children.description: The realization of faster-than-light travel is a new dawn for space exploration. Manned missions to other star systems are now not only possible, but necessary.
children.name: Exploración espacial

children.description: Advances in solar panel technology could offset the operating costs of our starbases. The panels would require an entire starbase module to generate enough energy, however.
children.name: Conversión de energía orbital
potential: Has Gestalt Consciousness Ethic

children.description: A centralized space installation built in close orbit around the system primary is necessary to make full use of the resources in a star system.
children.name: Construcción de base estelar

children.description: This will enable the construction of defensive deep space platforms to protect our Starbases.
children.name: Defensas en el espacio profundo

children.description: The invasion of another world is a staggering enterprise. There are immense logistical challenges that must be overcome before we can muster our first interplanetary armies.
feature_unlocks: Army: Assault Army These armies can be embarked and used for invasion on other planets.
children.name: Fuerzas expedicionarias interplanetarias

children.description: Intensive study within the fields of nanomachinery and subspace phenomena will eventually yield a new L-Gate Insight into the Disabled L-Gate mystery.
children.name: Conocimiento de Portal-L
